Posts.EditableText:
Hilarious. I point out [b:ta6jq3o0]you are spamming message boards[/b:ta6jq3o0], recommend a different way of going about advertising Quest rather than unsolicited advertising on message boards when similar unsolicited advertising wouldn't be/hasn't been tolerated on [b:ta6jq3o0]this[/b:ta6jq3o0] message board. I'm disruptive with all my "BS" and "insults" to you. Not to mention my generally staying on topic in threads, contributing ideas, options, and input towards ASL projects as well as Quest development... 

I'm just cruisin' for a banning.

I'd step back and take a look at the situation as well as my own actions before piping off all self-righteously.
